p: FIG. 2A is a graph illustrating LCMS results of a compound prepared according to Example 3. In addition, thermal analysis of the compound of Formula 11 was performed using a thermo gravimetric analysis (TGA) in a N 2 atmosphere at a temperature in the range of room temperature to 600°C at 10°C/min in a Pt pan in a disposable Al pan and a differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) at a temperature in the range of room temperature to 400°C in a disposable Al pan. As a result, Td was 467°C and Tg was 163°C. FIG. 2B is a graph illustrating thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) results of the compound of Formula 11 prepared according to Example 3 and FIG. 2C is a graph illustrating differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) of the compound of Formula 11 prepared according to Example 3.
